ActPublic Service Employment Act
PrecisAppointment of ROGER CLINCH of Bathurst, New Brunswick, to be a special adviser to the Prime Minister, to serve as an ad hoc provincial member of the Independent Advisory Board for Senate Appointments, to hold office during pleasure for a term of one year.
